data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bortoluzzi, Sidnei, Caron, Edilson (2019): Bledius hyalinus sp. nov. (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Oxytelinae), of the forcipatus group, first recorded from coastal Brazil. Zootaxa 4559 (2): 391-395, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4559.2.12|3 occurrences
